509:1: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ?
509:2: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī nānyatra rūpeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyati |
509:9: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati |
509:11: yaśca rūpasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
509:13: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati |
509:22: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā |
509:24: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
509:25: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam |
509:27: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ |
509:28: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate || 2 ||
509:30: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate || 3 ||
509:33: nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate |
509:37: paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ |
509:38: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit || 7 ||
509:41: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam |
509:44: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum || 10 ||
509:50: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā |
509:51: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām || 13 ||
509:54: prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām |
509:55: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim || 15 ||
509:73: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān || 24 ||
509:79: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ || 27 ||
509:81: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati || 28 ||
509:83: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati || 29 ||
509:86: śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ |
509:88: na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam |
509:92: na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī |
509:94: yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā |
509:95: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me'tra pravartate || 35 ||
509:96: sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu |
509:99: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime || 37 ||
509:103: kuryā hi gauravaṃ tatra śirasā pādavandanam || 39 ||
509:105: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet || 40 ||
509:107: yādṛśaṃ kāhitī karma lapsyate tādṛśaṃ phalam || 41 ||
509:111: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ || 43 ||
509:114: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyyā āyuṣmān vijña paṇḍitaḥ |
509:115: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā || 45 ||
509:116: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā ca bhājanam |
509:119: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣestvāṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ || 47 ||
509:121: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām || 48 ||
509:122: parīttā yadi pāpecchā śīlavanto bahū bhavet |
509:124: pūrvaṃ pariṣadaṃ jñātvā yadi śuddhā bhavettadā |
509:126: dānaṃ śīlaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ śrutaṃ tathā |
509:129: eteṣāṃ varṇa bhāṣeta evaṃ hi dhārayet sukham || 52 ||
509:148: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittaṃ bodhāya nāmitam |
509:149: mā cala tvaṃ pratijñāyāstiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu || 62 ||
509:150: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāle upasthite |
509:151: pratibhānaṃ labhet kṣipraṃ pravṛttaṃ yadi dhārayet || 63 ||
509:153: kiṃ vā punaḥ sarvasūtraṃ dhārayed yaḥ śrutārthikaḥ || 64 ||
509:156: itaḥ samādhito yaśca gāthāmekāṃ pi dhārayet |
509:157: sarvaṃ purimakaṃ puṇyaṃ kalāṃ nopaiti ṣoḍaśīm || 66 ||
509:159: imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutveha yaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ na kariṣyati || 67 ||
